filmography.title: Ziegfeld Follies
filmography.role_description: A featured dancer in the beautiful 'Beauty' ballet sequence, marking her first significant appearance in an MGM musical.
filmography.plot: From heaven, Florenz Ziegfeld recalls his greatest stars and introduces a series of musical and comedy numbers.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Win – Best Musical Comedy

filmography.title: The Harvey Girls
filmography.role_description: One of the wholesome waitresses who travels west to work for the Fred Harvey Company.
filmography.plot: A group of waitresses for the Fred Harvey Company travel west to open a restaurant and bring civilization to a rowdy town.

filmography.title: Till the Clouds Roll By
filmography.role_description: A featured dancer performing in the 'Smoke Gets in Your Eyes' number.
filmography.plot: A musical biography of the life and career of composer Jerome Kern, featuring an all-star cast.

filmography.title: Fiesta
filmography.role_description: A spirited Mexican girl who dances with Ricardo Montalban in this colorful musical drama.
filmography.plot: A retired matador wants his son to follow in his footsteps, but the son prefers music, while his twin sister wants to be a bullfighter.

filmography.title: The Unfinished Dance
filmography.role_description: A prima ballerina who becomes the idol of a young student, leading to professional jealousy and tragedy.
filmography.plot: A young ballet student idolizes the prima ballerina and tries to sabotage a rival dancer, with disastrous consequences.

filmography.title: On an Island with You
filmography.role_description: A movie star's friend and rival in a romantic musical set in Hawaii.
filmography.plot: A movie star travels to Hawaii to film a movie, where a naval officer falls in love with her despite her engagement.

filmography.title: The Kissing Bandit
filmography.role_description: A Spanish noblewoman who is courted by a timid man forced to follow in his father's bandit footsteps.
filmography.plot: A timid young man returns to California to take over his father's business, only to find out his father was a notorious bandit.

filmography.title: Words and Music
filmography.role_description: A dancer who performs the 'On Your Toes' ballet, showcasing her classical training.
filmography.plot: A biographical musical about the songwriting partnership of Richard Rodgers and Lorenz Hart.

filmography.title: East Side, West Side
filmography.role_description: A beautiful model who becomes a sympathetic friend to a woman struggling with a philandering husband.
filmography.plot: A New York socialite questions her marriage when her husband's old flame returns and is later found murdered.

filmography.title: Tension
filmography.role_description: A managing but supportive woman who helps a mild-mannered pharmacist framed for murder.
filmography.plot: A pharmacist plans to murder his wife's lover but changes his mind, only to find the man murdered anyway and himself a suspect.

filmography.title: The Wild North
filmography.role_description: A Native American woman who aids a trapper and a mountie lost in the wilderness.
filmography.plot: A Mountie tracks a trapper accused of murder into the frozen Canadian wilderness, where they must rely on each other to survive.

filmography.title: Singin' in the Rain
filmography.role_description: The silent, sultry 'Dancer in Green' with the long legs who seduces Gene Kelly in the 'Broadway Melody' ballet sequence.
filmography.plot: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

filmography.title: Sombrero
filmography.role_description: A beautiful woman caught in a feud between two Mexican villages.
filmography.plot: Three stories of love and conflict unfold in a Mexican village.

filmography.title: The Band Wagon
filmography.role_description: A classical ballerina who reluctantly teams up with a Hollywood hoofer (Fred Astaire) for a Broadway show.
filmography.plot: A pretentious artistic director is hired for a new Broadway musical and changes it beyond recognition.

filmography.title: Brigadoon
filmography.role_description: A villager in a magical Scottish town who falls in love with a visiting American (Gene Kelly).
filmography.plot: Two Americans on a hunting trip in Scotland discover a magical village that appears only once every hundred years.

filmography.title: Deep in My Heart
filmography.role_description: A featured dancer performing a passionate routine in this biopic of composer Sigmund Romberg.
filmography.plot: A biography of the Hungarian-born composer Sigmund Romberg.

filmography.title: It's Always Fair Weather
filmography.role_description: A smart, sophisticated TV program coordinator who can memorize boxing statistics and hold her own with Gene Kelly.
filmography.plot: Three World War II buddies agree to meet in ten years, but when the time comes, they find they have little in common.

filmography.title: Meet Me in Las Vegas
filmography.role_description: A haughty ballerina who becomes a lucky charm for a gambling rancher in Las Vegas.
filmography.plot: A rancher discovers that holding hands with a ballerina brings him luck at the roulette wheel.

filmography.title: Silk Stockings
filmography.role_description: A stern Soviet commissar sent to Paris who is wooed by capitalism and Fred Astaire in this musical remake of Ninotchka.
filmography.plot: A Soviet official is sent to Paris to retrieve three wayward composers but is charmed by the capitalist lifestyle.

filmography.title: Twilight for the Gods
filmography.role_description: A woman fleeing her past who becomes involved with a washed-up captain (Rock Hudson) on a decrepit ship.
filmography.plot: A court-martialed captain takes a cargo of passengers on a leaky ship from Tahiti to Mexico.

filmography.title: Party Girl
filmography.role_description: A showgirl who falls for a crooked lawyer trying to go straight, leading to danger from the mob.
filmography.plot: A mob lawyer tries to leave the racket to be with a showgirl, but the mob boss won't let him go.

filmography.title: Black Tights
filmography.role_description: The lead dancer in the segment 'Deuil en 24 Heures' in this anthology film of ballets by Roland Petit.
filmography.plot: Four ballet stories choreographed by Roland Petit, featuring Cyd Charisse, Moira Shearer, and Zizi Jeanmaire.

filmography.title: Two Weeks in Another Town
filmography.role_description: The manipulative ex-wife of a recovering film star who tries to derail his comeback in Rome.
filmography.plot: A former movie star trying to make a comeback visits Rome to work with a director who once mentored him.

filmography.title: The Silencers
filmography.role_description: A singer who performs the opening title song in this Matt Helm spy spoof.
filmography.plot: Secret agent Matt Helm is coaxed out of retirement to stop an evil organization from starting a nuclear war.

filmography.title: Warlords of Atlantis
filmography.role_description: An Atlantean high priestess in this British sci-fi adventure film.
filmography.plot: Explorers searching for Atlantis are dragged down to the ocean floor by a giant octopus and enslaved by the Atlanteans.
